Sentencas: A tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack was modeled, and its operation on biomass syngas was investigated.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The objective of this work was to develop a computer simulation model of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell system capable of predicting performance under various operating conditions and using diverse fuels.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The stack was modeled using Aspen Plus and considers ohmic, activation, and concentration losses.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: It was validated against published data for operation on natural gas.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: Operating parameters such as fuel and air utilization factor (U-f and U-a, respectively), current density j, and steam to carbon ratio (STCR) were varied and had significant influence.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The model was run on wood and miscanthus syngas.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The results indicated that there must be a trade-off between voltage, efficiency, and power with respect to j and that the stack should be operated at a low STCR and a high U-f. Also, the stack should be operated at a U-a of similar to 20%.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: Operation on biomass syngas was compared to natural gas operation and, as expected, performance degraded.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: Better stack performance was observed for wood syngas compared to miscanthus syngas.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: High efficiencies were predicted making these systems very promising.
Titulo: Simulation of a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stack Operating on Biomass Syngas Using Aspen Plus
